item.title: libgit2 v1.0 Released
item.description: After many years of planning, writing code, and fixing bugs, libgit2 v1.0 has been released. ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ libgit2 is a linkable library for working with git repositories in any application, and you probably interact with the library, even if you don't know it. That's because libgit2 powers your applications and your hosting provider, whether you use GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, or nearly anybody else. The Git community â€“ really, every software developer â€“ depends on libgit2. And we've finally released libgit2 v1.0.

item.title: Resiliency with Polly â€“ Anthony Giretti's .NET blog
item.description: PollyÂ is a .NET resilience and transient-fault-handling library that allows developers to express policies such as Retry, Circuit Breaker, Timeout, Bulkhead Isolation, and Fallback in a fluent and thread-safe manner. From version 6.0.1, Polly targets .NET Standard 1.1 and 2+.
